params.amount: The amount of DOLA to be borrowed.

borrowOnBehalf(address,uint256,uint256,u.details: Signed messaged can be invalidated by incrementing the nonce. Will always borrow to the msg.sender.

params.deadline: Timestamp after which the signed message will be invalid
params.from: The address of the user being borrowed from
params.r: The r param of the ECDSA signature
params.s: The s param of the ECDSA signature
params.v: The v param of the ECDSA signature

deposit(address,uint256).details: Will deposit the amount into the escrow contract.

params.amount: Amount of collateral token to deposit.
params.user: User to deposit on behalf of.

deposit(uint256).details: Will deposit the amount into the escrow contract.

params.amount: Amount of collateral token to deposit.

params.amountDeposit: Amount of collateral token to deposit into escrow.

forceReplenish(address,uint256).details: The function will only top the user back up to 0, meaning that the user will have a DBR deficit again in the next block.

params.amount: The amount of DBR the user will be replenished.
params.user: The address of the user being forced to replenish DBR

forceReplenishAll(address).details: The function will only top the user back up to 0, meaning that the user will have a DBR deficit again in the next block.

params.user: The address of the user being forced to replenish DBR

getCreditLimit(address).details: To calculate the available credit, subtract user debt from credit limit.

params.repaidDebt: Th amount of user user debt to liquidate.

params._value: Boolean representing the state pause state of borrows. true = paused, false = unpaused.

predictEscrow(address).details: Only use deposit() function for deposits and NOT the predicted escrow address unless you know what you're doing

params.user: Address of the user owning the escrow.

params.amount: The amount od DOLA to recall to the the lender.

repay(address,uint256).details: If the user has a DBR deficit, they risk initial debt being accrued by forced replenishments.

params.amount: DOLA amount to be repaid. If set to max uint debt will be repaid in full.
params.user: Address of the user whose debt is being repaid

params.repayAmount: Amount of DOLA to be repaid
params.withdrawAmount: Amount of underlying to be withdrawn from the escrow

params._borrowController: The new borrow controller conforming to the IBorrowController interface.

setCollateralFactorBps(uint256).details: Collateral factor mus be set below 100%

params._collateralFactorBps: The new collateral factor as measured in basis points.

params._liquidationFactorBps: The new liquidation factor in basis points. 1 = 0.01%/

setLiquidationFeeBps(uint256).details: Must be set between 0 and 10000 - liquidation factor.

params._liquidationFeeBps: The new liquidation fee set in basis points. 1 = 0.01%

setLiquidationIncentiveBps(uint256).details: Must be set between 0 and 10000 - liquidation fee.

params._liquidationIncentiveBps: The new liqudation incentive set in basis points. 1 = 0.01%

params._oracle: The new oracle conforming to the IOracle interface.

params._replenishmentIncentiveBps: The new replenishment incentive set in basis points. 1 = 0.01%

withdrawOnBehalf(address,uint256,uint256.details: Signed messaged can be invalidated by incrementing the nonce. Will always withdraw to the msg.sender.

params.deadline: Timestamp after which the signed message will be invalid
params.from: The address of the user owning the escrow being withdrawn from
params.r: The r param of the ECDSA signature
params.s: The s param of the ECDSA signature
params.v: The v param of the ECDSA signature

borrowOnBehalf(address,uint256,uint256,u.notice: Function for using a signed message to borrow on behalf of an address owning an escrow with collateral.

deposit(address,uint256).notice: Deposit amount of collateral into escrow on behalf of msg.sender

deposit(uint256).notice: Deposit amount of collateral into escrow

depositAndBorrow(uint256,uint256).notice: Deposit and borrow in a single transaction.

forceReplenish(address,uint256).notice: Function for forcing a user to replenish their DBR deficit at a pre-determined price. The replenishment will accrue additional DOLA debt. On a successful call, the caller will be paid a replenishment incentive.

forceReplenishAll(address).notice: Function for forcing a user to replenish all of their DBR deficit at a pre-determined price. The replenishment will accrue additional DOLA debt. On a successful call, the caller will be paid a replenishment incentive.

getCollateralValue(address).notice: View function for getting the dollar value of the user's collateral in escrow for the market.

getCreditLimit(address).notice: View function for getting the credit limit of a user.

getWithdrawalLimit(address).notice: View function for getting the withdrawal limit of a user. The withdrawal limit is how much collateral a user can withdraw before their loan would be underwater.

invalidateNonce().notice: Function for incrementing the nonce of the msg.sender, making their latest signed message unusable.

liquidate(address,uint256).notice: Function for liquidating a user's under water debt. Debt is under water when the value of a user's debt is above their collateral factor.

pauseBorrows(bool).notice: Pauses or unpauses borrowing for the market. Only gov can unpause a market, while gov and pauseGuardian can pause it.

predictEscrow(address).notice: View function for predicting the deterministic escrow address of a user.

recall(uint256).notice: Recalls amount of DOLA to the lender.

repay(address,uint256).notice: Function for repaying debt on behalf of user. Debt must be repaid in DOLA.

repayAndWithdraw(uint256,uint256).notice: Bundles repayment and withdrawal into a single function call.

setBorrowController(address).notice: sets the borrow controller to a new borrow controller. Only callable by governance.

setCollateralFactorBps(uint256).notice: sets the Collateral Factor requirement of the market as measured in basis points. 1 = 0.01%. Only callable by governance.

setGov(address).notice: sets the address of governance. Only callable by governance.

setLender(address).notice: sets the lender to a new lender. The lender is allowed to recall dola from the contract. Only callable by governance.

setLiquidationFactorBps(uint256).notice: sets the Liquidation Factor of the market as denoted in basis points. The liquidation Factor denotes the maximum amount of debt that can be liquidated in basis points. At 5000, 50% of of a borrower's underwater debt can be liquidated. Only callable by governance.

setLiquidationFeeBps(uint256).notice: sets the Liquidation Fee of the market as denoted in basis points. The Liquidation Fee is the percentage paid out to governance of a borrower's debt when successfully liquidated.

setLiquidationIncentiveBps(uint256).notice: sets the Liquidation Incentive of the market as denoted in basis points. The Liquidation Incentive is the percentage paid out to liquidators of a borrower's debt when successfully liquidated.

setOracle(address).notice: sets the oracle to a new oracle. Only callable by governance.

setPauseGuardian(address).notice: sets the pause guardian. The pause guardian can pause borrowing. Only callable by governance.

setReplenismentIncentiveBps(uint256).notice: sets the Replenishment Incentive of the market as denoted in basis points. The Replenishment Incentive is the percentage paid out to replenishers on a successful forceReplenish call, denoted in basis points.

withdrawOnBehalf(address,uint256,uint256.notice: Function for using a signed message to withdraw on behalf of an address owning an escrow with collateral.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Replenishment incentive must be less than 100%"

arguments.value: Replenishment incentive must be less than 100%

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Replenishment incentive must be less than 100%"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Liquidation param allow profitable self liquidation"

arguments.value: Liquidation param allow profitable self liquidation

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Liquidation param allow profitable self liquidation"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only gov can call this function"

arguments.value: Only gov can call this function

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only gov can call this function"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "New liquidation param allow profitable self liquidation"

arguments.value: New liquidation param allow profitable self liquidation

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "New liquidation param allow profitable self liquidation"

documentation.text:
@notice sets the oracle to a new oracle. Only callable by governance.
@param _oracle The new oracle conforming to the IOracle interface.

@notice sets the borrow controller to a new borrow controller. Only callable by governance.
@param _borrowController The new borrow controller conforming to the IBorrowController interface.

@notice sets the address of governance. Only callable by governance.
@param _gov Address of the new governance.

@notice sets the lender to a new lender. The lender is allowed to recall dola from the contract. Only callable by governance.
@param _lender Address of the new lender.

@notice sets the pause guardian. The pause guardian can pause borrowing. Only callable by governance.
@param _pauseGuardian Address of the new pauseGuardian.

@notice Recalls amount of DOLA to the lender.
@param amount The amount od DOLA to recall to the the lender.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only pause guardian or governance can pause"

arguments.value: Only pause guardian or governance can pause

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only pause guardian or governance can pause"

documentation.text:
@notice Pauses or unpauses borrowing for the market. Only gov can unpause a market, while gov and pauseGuardian can pause it.
@param _value Boolean representing the state pause state of borrows. true = paused, false = unpaused.

@notice View function for getting the dollar value of the user's collateral in escrow for the market.
@param user Address of the user.
